title: Premier League top scorers 2025-26: who is leading race for golden boot?
summary: The English Premier League features standout players dominating the goalscoring charts this season. Several top forwards are showcasing their talents, consistently finding the back of the net. Fans are eagerly watching to see who will lead the league in goals by the end of the season.
